name: claude-config-plugins
description: Role-specific Claude Code plugins with specialized agents, commands, and hooks for software engineers, QA engineers, product managers, engineering managers, and UX designers

plugins.name: engineer-toolkit
plugins.description: Comprehensive toolkit for software engineers with specialized agents for code review, debugging, refactoring, API design, and performance optimization. Includes automated testing, linting, and complexity analysis hooks.

plugins.name: qa-toolkit
plugins.description: Comprehensive QA engineering toolkit with test automation, accessibility auditing, performance testing, bug analysis, and visual regression testing capabilities. Perfect for QA engineers and test automation specialists.

plugins.name: pm-toolkit
plugins.description: Product management toolkit with feature analysis, user story creation, RICE prioritization, roadmap planning, and stakeholder communication. Ideal for product managers and product owners.

plugins.name: em-toolkit
plugins.description: Engineering management toolkit with DORA metrics, sprint planning, technical debt assessment, team coordination, and project health monitoring. Built for engineering managers and technical leads.

plugins.name: ux-toolkit
plugins.description: UX design toolkit with accessibility compliance, design system management, user flow optimization, responsive design validation, and interaction design. Perfect for UX designers and design system maintainers.
